text:
I don’t want to fight. I just want my family safe. You are free to remove yourself and behave like your single, just as you did before you asked for a
separation (no further details required). But taking my kids and alienating me, feels abusive to them.
I hope you’ll reconsider the advice of professional child advocates instead of the internet advice you have chosen to identity with your position. The
last has the time with us as a family (10 meetings) and qualifications to provide personal advice.
But this is, without question, a reflection on your true ability to make child focused decisions in Max and Adrian’s best interests. And the alienation,
while I have 50/50 custody, has gone on for nine months now with me getting only a few days with them.
I think this is bad for Max and Adrian. Want to rethink?
Message 2194 of 4024
I am working with my lawyer to address considering the totality of what has transpired.

From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: You are past the 20 hour mark on OFW
Message 2195 of 4024
The RO was put in place and restrictions to access home based on conditions you created.
I have priorities that are greater than fulfilling your need for creating the perfect sound.
Yes please document decision that led to purchase of this equipment and we can sort it out when we divide assets equitably.

Subject:Re: Sonos..

Thanks for confirming your social agenda is more important and that you refuse to return my personal property after repeated promises to do so.
That leads to make the only expensive and unnecessary monetary outlay in my entire hodgepodge of goodwill, CL, and consignment.
